snippet.title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days Dev Diary #1: Setting the Scene
snippet.description:
Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is a PC side-scrolling shelter survival game set in Texas, 1980 in the world of #IntotheDead and #IntotheDead2. You'll guide a desperate group of zombie apocalypse survivors to safety, crafting weapons, scavenging resources, and balancing your group’s needs to get everyone out of danger alive.

In the first of our development diary series, we give players an introduction to the world of the game: the setting, the city, and a taste of what's to come. 

Wishlist now on Steam for updates: link.pikpok.com/steamourdarkestdays

______

intothedead.com
twitter.com/intothedead
facebook.com/intothedeadgame
